name: Spicy Chicken Stir-Fry
description: A quick and flavorful stir-fry dish featuring chicken and vegetables with a kick of spice.
steps: Step 1: Wash the chicken under cold water and pat dry with a paper towel. Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
Step 2: Peel and slice the onion into thin strips. Peel the garlic and mince it.
Step 3: In a large skillet or wok, heat 2 tbsp of sesame oil over medium-high heat.
Step 4: Add the chicken pieces to the skillet and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until cooked through and browned.
Step 5: Add the minced garlic and sliced onion to the skillet and stir-fry for an additional 3 minutes until the onions are translucent.
Step 6: Stir in 1 tsp of red pepper powder and 1/2 tsp of salt. Mix well to coat the chicken and vegetables.
Step 7: Cook for another 2 minutes, then remove from heat and serve hot.

name: Tofu and Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A colorful and healthy stir-fry with tofu and fresh vegetables, perfect for a quick meal.
steps: Step 1: Drain the tofu and press it gently between paper towels to remove excess moisture. Cut into cubes.
Step 2: Peel and slice the onion into thin rings. Peel and slice the carrot into thin julienne strips. Mince the garlic.
Step 3: In a large skillet, heat 2 tbsp of sesame oil over medium heat.
Step 4: Add the tofu cubes and cook for about 4-5 minutes until golden brown on all sides.
Step 5: Add the minced garlic, sliced onion, and carrot to the skillet. Stir-fry for 5 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Step 6: Season with 1/2 tsp of salt and mix well. Cook for another 2 minutes.
Step 7: Remove from heat and serve it hot over rice or noodles.

name: Beef and Tomato Skillet
description: A simple yet hearty beef and tomato dish that's easy to prepare.
steps: Step 1: Wash the tomatoes and cut them into wedges. Peel and slice the onion into thin strips. Mince the garlic.
Step 2: Heat 2 tbsp of cooking oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Step 3: Add beef to the skillet, seasoning with 1 tsp of salt. Cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring frequently until browned.
Step 4: Add the sliced onion and garlic to the skillet and cook for 3 minutes until the onion is translucent.
Step 5: Stir in the tomato wedges and cook for an additional 5-7 minutes until softened.
Step 6: Remove from heat and serve warm with bread or rice.

name: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
description: Creamy mashed potatoes infused with garlic, making for a perfect side dish.
steps: Step 1: Peel the potatoes and cut them into even-sized cubes. Rinse under cold water.
Step 2: In a medium pot, place the potatoes and cover them with cold water. Add 1 tsp of salt.
Step 3: Bring to a boil over high heat. Once boiling, reduce heat to medium and simmer for 15-20 minutes until tender.
Step 4: While potatoes are boiling, peel and mince the garlic.
Step 5: In a small pan, heat 2 tbsp of cooking oil over low heat. Add the minced garlic and cook gently for about 2 minutes to infuse the oil.
Step 6: Drain the potatoes thoroughly and return them to the pot. Mash them well.
Step 7: Pour in the garlic-infused oil and mix until creamy. Adjust seasoning if necessary, then serve warm.

name: Spicy Carrot and Potato Stew
description: A hearty stew made with carrots and potatoes, surprisingly flavorful and satisfying.
steps: Step 1: Peel the potato and carrot, then dice both into small cubes. Peel and dice the onion and mince the garlic.
Step 2: In a large pot, heat 2 tbsp of cooking oil over medium heat.
Step 3: Add the onion and garlic; saut√© for 2-3 minutes until fragrant and translucent.
Step 4: Add the potatoes and carrots, stirring well. Cook for another 5 minutes.
Step 5: Sprinkle in 1 tsp of red pepper powder and 1 tsp of salt. Stir to combine.
Step 6: Add 2-3 cups of water to the pot, reducing heat to low. Cover and simmer for 20-25 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Step 7: Adjust seasoning if necessary and serve hot.
